release.change: Breaking Change: Geocoded Location sensor attributes for latitude and longitude have been combined into location, the sensor will no longer show on the map. Additional attributes also added to the sensor.
Breaking Change: Template widgets will only update when the template detects a change. If you are not seeing frequent updates then you are hit by rate limiting and will need to readjust the template.
Breaking Change: Notification Received event will only be sent if a notification contains "confirmation: true" in the service call.
Add authentication option to button widget
Add option to bypass locking the app when on home WiFi
Only subscribe to state changes that we care about for entity state and media player widgets
Allow device controls on locked devices for Android 13+
Bug fixes, performance improvements, design tweaks and dependency updates
Faster entity selection for entity state complication
Always default to using the phone for logging in
